column4: UPDATE 2-Licence sales help SAP operating profit to beat forecasts
column5: * Still sees 2015 operating profit of 5.6-5.9 bln euros   (Rewrites  adds shares  analyst comment  detail)

column4: Intel says data center business to grow less than expected
column5: Intel Corp  cut revenue growth forecast for its highly profitable business of making chips for data centers as businesses reduce spending due to weak macroeconomic growth. | Video

column4: UPDATE 3-Intel says data center business to grow less than expected
column5: * Sees Q4 revenue of $14.8 bln  plus or minus $500 mln   (Adds details  analyst comment)
Oct 13 Intel Corp reported a 6.3 percent fall in quarterly profit on Tuesday  weighed down by continued weak demand for chips used in personal computers.
